skills.name: Venom Shot
skills.description: Shoots a venom coated projectile, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a poison condition.

ranks.description: Shoots a venom coated projectile, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a poison condition.

skills.name: Volley
skills.description:
Fires a projectile in the air, raining shrapnel within a radius below. 

Deals $DMG constant damage to targets in the area.

ranks.description:
Fires a projectile in the air, raining shrapnel within a radius below. 

Deals $DMG constant damage to targets in the area.

skills.name: Killer Jab
skills.description: Strikes nearby targets, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a poison condition.

ranks.description: Strikes nearby targets, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a poison condition.

skills.name: Pay Day
skills.description: Mugs adjacent targets, dealing $DMG damage. Hit targets will be mugged and stunned, dropping currency when hit. Previously mugged targets will not drop currency again.

ranks.description: Mugs adjacent targets, dealing $DMG damage. Hit targets will be mugged and stunned, dropping currency when hit. Previously mugged targets will not drop currency again.

skills.name: Bomb Trap
skills.description: Places an explosive trap that triggers within proximity of nearby targets, dealing $DMG damage.

ranks.description: Places an explosive trap that triggers within proximity of nearby targets, dealing $DMG damage.

skills.name: Caltrops
skills.description: Places a trap that surrounds the caster, dealing $DMG constant damage to targets within the radius.

ranks.description: Places a trap that surrounds the caster, dealing $DMG constant damage to targets within the radius.

skills.name: Devious Signet
skills.description: Applies an energizing, dexterious boon to the caster and nearby allies.

ranks.description: Applies an energizing, dexterious boon to the caster and nearby allies.

skills.name: Mist Veil
skills.description: Evokes a mist, vanishing the caster and healing for a short time while invisible.

ranks.description: Evokes a mist, vanishing the caster and healing for a short time while invisible.

skills.name: Avoidance
skills.description: Applies a 15% evasion bonus, additionally enhancing initial movement speed and dash speed.

ranks.description: Applies a 15% evasion bonus, additionally enhancing initial movement speed and dash speed.

skills.name: Agile Technique
skills.description:
Unlocks the ability to triple jump, dash jump, and bounce. 

Double tap $DASHINPUT to dash jump, and hold to bounce.

ranks.description:
Unlocks the ability to triple jump, dash jump, and bounce. 

Double tap $DASHINPUT to dash jump, and hold to bounce.
